channel.title: Quest tab
channel.description: ATM, my quest tab is empty, but I want to add the bold orange text Saying e.g kills Does something have a snippet they can link me too or something.

item.title: Quest tab
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:12, topic:526573”][quote author=Pkor159 link=topic=645317.msg4341449#msg4341449 date=1375223395]
if you want to add like the count of kills the players has, do In your client.java.

Explanation getPA() - sends the words you want to add.
SendFrame126 - sends the frame.
@lre@ - if the colour. (Colours i know - @red@‘red’ @gre@‘green’, @yel@‘yellow’, @cya@‘cyan’, @blu@'blue, @bla@‘black’)
29163 - the line number. (everytime you want to add a second line change the last numbers. Example 29164, 29165 ext…)
[/quote]
That won’t do what he wants…
This is what he is talking about:

Like I said, RSInterface.java:
The one that says “Website & Forum”:
addText(29163, “”, 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
In order from left to right:
ID, Text, (disabled) Color, Text centered (false for no, true for yes), Text shadowed (Again, false for no, true for yes), hovertype (to be honest idk what this does), Font type (this is based off the declaration in the method), and Font type (I believe 0-4 are different font types, I never tested them all.[/quote]

Thanks a bunch sk8r I’ll have a go with that

Read full topic

item.title: Quest tab
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Pkor159, post:10, topic:526573”]if you want to add like the count of kills the players has, do In your client.java.

Explanation getPA() - sends the words you want to add.
SendFrame126 - sends the frame.
@lre@ - if the colour. (Colours i know - @red@‘red’ @gre@‘green’, @yel@‘yellow’, @cya@‘cyan’, @blu@'blue, @bla@‘black’)
29163 - the line number. (everytime you want to add a second line change the last numbers. Example 29164, 29165 ext…)[/quote]
That won’t do what he wants…
This is what he is talking about:

Like I said, RSInterface.java:
The one that says “Website & Forum”:
addText(29163, “”, 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
In order from left to right:
ID, Text, (disabled) Color, Text centered (false for no, true for yes), Text shadowed (Again, false for no, true for yes), hovertype (to be honest idk what this does), Font type (this is based off the declaration in the method), and Font type (I believe 0-4 are different font types, I never tested them all.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest tab
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“u loose, post:7, topic:526573”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=645317.msg4341144#msg4341144 date=1375186957]
You want to add bold orange text?

That’s handled via client…
[/quote]
Yeah like free quest, members quest, except my own text.

As I’ve never done this, would you be able to link me to something that may be able to help me?[/quote]
I’m not seeing a tutorial. But all it is is editing RSInterface.java.
The text is just using a different type than the normal quest ones.

Read full topic
